elements.text: Your neighborhood has monthly HOA meetings, and it's your month to plan the meeting. As you try to plan, you lose track of important details and start over many times. Before trying again, you take a break and ask a friend for...

elements.name: HOA Meeting_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
